Adafruit_IO_key.description: Key to interact with Adafruit IO services

Adafruit_IO_username.description: Username of the Adafruit IO account that's used to interact

low_light_mode.description: Uses the Sense hat with a lower luminosity

use_adafruit_color.description: Use the color saved in adafruit IO instead of the color in the config file

temperature_treshhold.description: Number used to switch color based on the temperature

feeds.description: Which feeds to listen on the adafruit IO service

light_toggle.description: Name of the feed which should bet used to toggle the light

light_color.description: Name of the feed which should be used to set the light color

temp.description: Name of the feed which should be used to upload the temperature to

humidity.description: Name of the feed which should be used to upload the humidity to
